entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:33 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 08:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -7.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: SSW 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this morning and early this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
